title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.11 - Signal lights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.11 - Signal lights

State Regulations

Signal lights used on the bridges shall have the following
meanings: Green light: All vehicles must proceed. Red light: All vehicles must stop. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
